いびる: (いびる) - to pick on; to tease
いぶし銀: (いぶしぎん) - oxidized silver/oxidised silver; refined (aesthetic) taste
いぶり出す: (いぶりだす) - to smoke animal out of its den
いぶり漬け: (いぶりづけ) - smoked daikon pickles (famous product of Akita Prefecture)
いぼた蝋: (いぼたろう) - tree wax; insect wax; Chinese wax
いぼた蠟虫: (イボタロウムシ) - Chinese wax scale insect (Ericerus pela)
いま一つ: (いまひとつ) - one more/another/the other; not quite/not very good/lacking
いま一歩: (いまいっぽ) - one more/another/the other; not quite; close run/just falling short of success
いもち病: (いもちびょう) - rice blight; rice blast
いもづる式: (いもづるしき) - one after another; in succession
いもづる接続: (いもづるせつぞく) - daisy chain connection
いも虫: (イモムシ) - hornworm (caterpillar of a hawk moth); (hairless) caterpillar
いやが上に: (いやがうえに) - (usu. as いやが上にも)  even more; all the more
いやが上にも: (いやがうえにも) - all the more
いやだ: (いやだ) - not a chance; not likely; no way
いやはや: (いやはや) - (Oh) dear!; (Oh) dear me!; Good gracious
いや増す: (いやます) - to increase (all the more)
いよいよという時: (いよいよというとき) - (at the) last moment; (in the) nick of time
いよいよと言う時: (いよいよというとき) - (at the) last moment; (in the) nick of time
いようが: (いようが) - (from いるようが)  (following te-form verb) regardless of; whether (or not)
いよやか: (いよやか) - tall; stout; clear; well defined
いらか段: (いらかだん) - corbie-step; corbel gable; crowsteps
いらしてください: (いらしてください) - please come (and visit us); please come (to our shop)
いらしゃい: (いらしゃい) - (used as a polite imperative) come/go/stay; welcome!
いらしゃいませ: (いっらしゃいませ) - welcome (in shops, etc.)
いらっしゃい: (いらしゃい) - (used as a polite imperative) come/go/stay; welcome!
いらっしゃいませ: (いっらしゃいませ) - welcome (in shops, etc.)
いらっしゃってください: (いらっしゃってください) - please come (and visit us); please come (to our shop)
いらっしゃる: (いらっしゃる) - (irregular forms such as いらした, etc. in colloquial Japanese; sometimes written 居らっしゃる) to come/to go/to be (somewhere); (after a -te form, or the particle "de") is (doing)/are (doing)
いられないくらい: (いられないくらい) - almost not able (to do something)
いら立つ: (いらだつ) - to be irritated; to get annoyed; to lose one's patience
いりがしら: (いりがしら) - kanji "enter" radical at top (radical 11)
いりちー: (いりちー) - stir-frying then boiling in liquid sauce; food that has been stir-fried and boiled in liquid sauce
いりやね: (いりがしら) - kanji "enter" radical at top (radical 11)
いろは楓: (イロハカエデ) - Japanese maple (Acer palmatum)
いろは歌留多: (いろはガルタ) - playing cards bearing proverbs in the traditional ordering of the Japanese syllabary
いわく付き: (いわくつき) - with an interesting history (story); with a shady history; with circumstances that are difficult to explain
いを用いる: (いをもちいる) - to pay attention to
いんげん豆: (インゲンマメ) - common bean (Phaseolus vulgaris); kidney bean; navy bean; wax bean; green bean; string bean; French bean
いんちき: (いんちき) - cheating/fake/bogus; travelling seller of trinkets, magic tricks, etc. (traveling)
い段: (いだん) - row of syllables on the Japanese syllabary table that ends with the vowel sound "i"
い辛っぽい: (いがらっぽい) - acrid; pungent; irritating
う: (う) - (after the imperfective form of certain verbs and adjectives) indicates speculation; indicates will; indicates invitation
うぃる: (うぃる) - (commonly used at the end of ultra-short sentences on microblogs, e.g. Twitter) I will ...; I'm going to ...
ういっす: (ういっす) - (possibly from おっす) Hi
うお座: (うおざ) - {astron} Pisces (constellation)/the Fish/the Fishes; fishmongers' guild
うお氷に上る: (うおこおりにのぼる) - third climate of spring (when the ice breaks and fish start appearing near the surface)
うかがい知る: (うかがいしる) - to perceive; to understand
うかぬ顔: (うかぬかお) - long face; looking dejected
うかぬ顔をする: (うかぬかおをする) - to look disheartened
うかれ歩く: (うかれあるく) - to gad around
うがん: (うがん) - (from 拝み)  (Okinawa) sacred place; sacred grove
うき目: (うきめ) - bitter experience; misery; distress; grief; sad thoughts; hardship
うき身: (うきみ) - wretched life; life of misery
うぐいす張り: (うぐいすばり) - nightingale (flooring); method of laying floors to deliberately make a noise (like a nightingale's call) when walked across (security feature)
うぐいす菜: (ウグイスナ) - young greens (of mizuna, Japanese mustard spinach, rape, etc.)
うぐいす餅: (うぐいすもち) - mochi filled with red bean paste and topped with green soy flour
うけ取る: (うけとる) - to receive/to get/to accept; to take/to interpret/to understand
うさぎ小屋: (うさぎごや) - rabbit hutch; (used in 1979 EC report) small Japanese houses/cramped Japanese housing
うさん臭い: (うさんくさい) - suspicious-looking; shady; questionable; dubious; fishy
うざがる: (うざがる) - (from うざい and がる) to behave annoyed; to feel annoyed
うざっこい: (うざっこい) - jumbled up; confused; frustrating
うしろ倒し: (うしろだおし) - postponement; moving back
うしろ手: (うしろで) - hands behind one's back/hands tied behind one's back; behind (e.g. someone)/rear/back; appearance from behind
うしろ暗い: (うしろぐらい) - shady; underhanded; questionable
うじゃうじゃ: (ujauja) - em enxames, em aglomerados; tediosamente, lentamente
うじゃける: (うじゃじゃける) - (for a fruit) to go bad and lose its shape from being overripe or damaged; to feel listless/to be dull/to be lazy/to look bored
うじゃじゃける: (うじゃじゃける) - (for a fruit) to go bad and lose its shape from being overripe or damaged; to feel listless/to be dull/to be lazy/to look bored
